item.title: MDS Block 6
item.description: My experience and thoughts on block 6 of MDS at UBC. The courses were: Cloud Computing, Privacy & Ethics, Causal Modeling, & Advanced Machine Learning Methods.

item.title: MDS Block 5
item.description: My experience and thoughts on block 5 of MDS at UBC. The courses were: Collab Soft Dev, Regression II, Time/Spat Analysis, & Bayes.

item.title: Overfitting
item.description: This post is on Overfitting, what it is and why it matters.
